title: TLDR Parents
description:
Tired of juggling countless school and extracurricular emails? Let us help! Forward them to TLDR Parents, and we'll automatically: generate summaries, create calendar events, extract key links and forms, and give your family a platform for collaboration and task management.

At TLDR Parents, our mission is to create intelligent, AI-driven software that keeps parents informed, organized, and happy with minimal effort.
